tweets.author_name: Austin Morris, Real Housewife of Madison
tweets.html:
Oh, it's all falling apart already. This is bad on every level. #SNL

— Austin Morris, Real Housewife of Madison (@austindotTV) March 4, 2012

That tight close-up of blatant cue card reading seemed like a deliberate passive-aggressive directorial choice. #snl

— Tara Ariano (@TaraAriano) March 4, 2012

Lindsay Lohan apparently made no effort to learn her lines. She's very clearly reading off the cards. #SNL

— Wes Ambrecht (@iamwesley) March 4, 2012

You could actually feel the crowd pull for Lohan to finish that short monologue inside the "Scared Straight" sketch. #SNL

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) March 4, 2012

Are the people holding cue cards for Lohan standing purposely too close to the camera so it's SO OBVIOUS she doesn't know her lines? #SNL

— FLAMES ON (@thesideofmyface) March 4, 2012

Lohan, meanwhile, is January Jones-like in her lack of energy and competence.

— Mark Lotto (@marklotto) March 4, 2012

The crowd really seems to want to laugh along with her, not at her. But itâ€™s not happening yet. #SNL

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) March 4, 2012

Jack White is just Edward Scissorhands with human hands.

— kelly oxford (@kellyoxford) March 4, 2012

Lindsay Lohan looks terrible now. Can't believe I used to masturbate to her when she was 12. #SNL

I'm determined to be more positive on Twitter. So I'll say that tonight's SNL is funnier than Billy Crystal's Oscars opening.

That was exactly what a #SNL musical performance should look/sound like.

This...is an #SNL that exists. It's about the best thing I can say about it at this point.
